c74object.name: sy.case
c74object.description: Converts the case of the incoming symbols, depending on the chosen mode.

objarg.name: mode
objarg.description: The optional argument sets the value for the "mode" attribute. This can be either the integer value of the attribute, or one of the following symbols: "lower", "upper", "switch", "title", "fold".

method.name: anything
method.description: Changes the case of each individual symbol in the incoming list and outputs the result.

method.name: bang
method.description: Changes the case of the most recently received input list.

attribute.name: listout
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description:
Sets the mode for the case conversion:
- None (default): don't convert case
- Lower: convert to lower case
- Upper: convert to upper case
- Title: symbol_capitalize each word individually
- Switch: switch the existing case, for each character
- Fold: fold the case, for string comparison

attribute.name: numin
numout
